name: adrianocahete.dev
description: Adriano Cahete | Product Designer & UI Developer
author: Adriano Cahete

scripts.resume: echo 'resume task is deprecated, running `npm run generate` instead' && npm run generate
scripts.performance: cross-env LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS="--emulated-form-factor desktop" npx lighthouse-badges --urls https://adrianocahete.dev/ -r -o ./static/performance/ -b flat
scripts.perf_single: cross-env LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS="--emulated-form-factor desktop" npx lighthouse-badges --urls https://adrianocahete.dev/ -s -o ./static/performance/ -b flat
